synopsis.text: Colete and her friends embark on a quest in the lush world of Tethe'alla, a parallel universe to their own, in the second arc of Tales of Symphonia. As the chosen one, Colete must awaken the spirits guarding the mana to prevent the world from ending due to mana drain. However, the true nature of her role as the chosen one is revealed, and she must sacrifice herself to become a vessel for the Goddess Martel. Unwilling to accept this fate, Lloyd and the group oppose the Angels and flee to Tethe'alla. As the balance between the two worlds begins to crumble, Lloyd must find a way to restore Colete to her former self and prevent both worlds from ending. The group faces new challenges and obstacles in Tethe'alla, as they continue their quest to save their friend and the world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
